item.description:
Creating Vibrant Health with Ayurveda - Part I

May 1st

6:30 pm – 8:00 pm

Cost: Sign up for both for a great experience and great price! $45 for both if pay by April 10th. 

Presented by: Tobi Gold

Would you like to know how to create physical and psychological balance with the foods you eat and when you eat them? Dear Friends, Ever since I enjoyed an Ayurvedic Retreat at Kripalu (almost 2 years ago) I have adopted many of the practices of Ayurveda for my personal dosha! It will come as no surprise to anyone who knows me that my Dosha is the HOT one called Pitta. I use the cooling oil of the coconut on my feet in the AM. I avoid hot sun at mid-day, wear cooling colors and manage stress with daily meditation.

In this class you will discover YOUR dosha and the best foods, times of day to eat, sleep and work.

 

Creating Vibrant Health with Ayurveda - Part I will take place at Solstice

Click here for the details........http://www.meetup.com/Yoga-With-Tobi/events/110835692/

 

Creating Vibrant Health with Ayurveda - Part II will take place on May 22nd at Tobi's home, so you can EAT!

Click here for details.....http://www.meetup.com/Yoga-With-Tobi/events/110839912/
item.name: Creating Vibrant Health with Ayurveda - Part I
